title: econoprof
text:
This is my Quarto website. It’s part of my #30DaysOfQuarto project. My current goals are to:

Learn Quarto.
Make a website that reflects a new Minimum Viable Product each day.
Do something about my ToBeRead Pile.

Toolchain for this one:

RStudio including Quarto
Quarto.pub, a free site from Posit for publishing using Quarto

Some useful resources for this one are:

All things Quarto
Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel’s very useful Get Started guides here
Josh French’s Creating Websites with Quarto and Github playlist on Youtube.
Isabella Velásquez on Building a Blog with Quarto

To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: About
text: I’m Joan Combs Durso. I used to teach economics, finance, statistics, quant methods, research methods, all the interdisciplinary seminars, and CPR. I’m a feminist economist. Opinions here are entirely my own. More about me later. This is my #day1 About page.
